mapper.insert: insert into num_run_deil (NUM_RUNID, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, SDAYS, EDAYS, SCHCLASSID, OverTime) values (#{numRunid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sdays,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{edays,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{schclassid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{overtime,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select * from num_run_deil where NUM_RUNID = #{id} order by NUM_RUNID limit #{offset}, #{limit}
select count(*) from num_run_deil where NUM_RUNID = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from num_run_deil where NUM_RUNID = #{numRunid} and STARTTIME = #{starttime} and SDAYS = #{sdays}
